#api_token.title: Glami API key
#api_token.description: API token can be found in your Glami partner admin interface. It is stored in Settings -> E-shop settings -> API keys.

dateFrom.title: Date from
dateFrom.description: Any date accepted by strtotime (https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.strtotime.php) function. Glami allows to download data from the last 365 days.

incremental_update.title: Incremental Update
incremental_update.description: If enabled, new or updated rows will be added to the storage table. If disabled, the table will be truncated before inserting new data. Recommended value is true.
